author: Luke Lee
description: All-in-One Presence Detection System - combines WiFi MQTT detection, GPS geofencing, Anyone logic, manual override, and delayed away. Includes individual presence drivers and composite aggregation driver for 'anyone home' functionality
releaseNotes: Version 0.5.0 - Major update: Added homebridge-securitysystem integration for advanced presence and guest management through HomeKit Security System interface. Implemented target mode hints for smart away transitions, event-based mode updates, and improved presence detection logic. Anyone Motion device is now always maintained regardless of Security System setting.
